price: ߊ߲ ߣߊ߬ ‹ ߘߐ߬ߛߊߙߌ › ߣߐ߰ߦߊ߬ ߟߴߌ ߣߍ߲߭ ߞߊ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߛߴߌ ߘߌ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߟߊߝߎ߬ ߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ߫ ߣߌߘߐߜߍߟߍ߲ ߡߊߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا لُّدّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā yassarnāhu bilisānika litubashira bihi al-mutaqīna watundhira bihi qawman luddan
translations: that you may give glad tidings
